title: Giana Sisters (Keep Da Scene Alive)

Makke's notes:

"If I remember correctly, I recorded the vocals for this in a few different takes, and Thomas Detert was mentioned in both heroes and remixers in one. But in the final version he's only in the remixers section, making the AGAIN! shout a bit strange. :) "
